text.data-name: Purdy & Figg makes ultra-concentrated, naturally scented eco-friendly cleaning power that you dilute at home with tap water, designed to clean all the surfaces in your home. The all purpose cleaner will transform your cleaning routine saving you time, mone
text.tspan: Purdy & Figg makes ultra-concentrated, naturally scented eco-friendly cleaning power that
you dilute at home with tap water, designed to clean all the surfaces in your home. The all
purpose cleaner will transform your cleaning routine saving you time, money and space at
